title: LG 65SJ8500 4K LED SJ8500
description:
In this video we take a look at LG's 2017 LED TV model 65SJ8500.  For more information or to place an order please visit us at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/109066/LG-65-White-Super-UHD-4K-HDR-Smart-LED-HDTV-With-WebOS-3.5-65SJ8500.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=65SJ8500_2017054 

Features:
- Picture Quality:
Ultra HD (3840 x 2160): Yes
TruMotion 240 (Refresh Rate 120Hz): Yes
Nano Cell Display: Yes
Active HDR with Dolby Vision™: Yes
HDR Effect: Yes
Wider Color Gamut: Yes
Tru Color Accuracy: Yes
IPS Panel: Yes
Billion Rich Colors: Yes
Ultra Luminance: Yes
4K Upscaler: Yes
Local Dimming: Yes

- Smart TV:
webOS 3.5: Yes
Magic Remote Control: Included
Natural Voice Recognition: Yes
Universal Control Capability: Yes
LG Content Store (App Store): Yes
Full Web Browser: Yes
Channel Plus: Yes
Smart Share: Yes
Screen Share: Yes
Content Share: Yes

- Audio:
Speaker System: 2.2 Channel
Output Power: 40W (WF: 20W)
Sound designed by harman/ kardon™: Yes
DTS Decoder: DTS-HD
Surround Mode: Ultra Surround
Hi-Fi Audio: Yes
Wireless Sound Sync: Yes

- Connectivity:
Wi-Fi® Built In: 802.11ac
Wi-Fi Direct: Yes
IP Control: Yes
Simplink (HDMI CEC): Yes

- Inputs:
HDMI: 4 (HDCP 2.2)
USB: 3
RF In (Antenna/Cable): 1
Composite In: 1
Component In: Shared w/ Composite
Ethernet: 1
Optical: 1
RS232C (Mini Jack): 1

- Wall Mount:
VESA: 300 x 300
